alert.note: Alert for Inland Brazoria; Inland Matagorda (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:37PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Brazoria and north central Matagorda Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 537 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Van Vleck, or 8 miles west of Sweeny, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Van Vleck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
